bibl.title: The Petrie Papyri. Second Edition (P. Petrie2). Vol. I: The Wills.
bibl.note: P. Petrie2 I, 1-31. - Reedition of P. Petrie I-III (1901-1905). - Vol. I. Introduction. - General Commentary. - The Texts [Arsinoïte nome, 238-226 B.C.]. - Indexes.
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, The Petrie Papyri. Second Edition (P. Petrie2). Vol. I: The Wills. (Collectanea Hellenistica. II.)
Brussel, Koninklijke Academie voor Wetenschappen, Letteren en Schone Kunsten van België (Diffusion: Brepols, Turnhout), 1991, 8°, 266 pp. et 32 pll. 1.300 fr. b.
P. Petrie2 I, 1-31. - Reedition of P. Petrie I-III (1901-1905). - Vol. I. Introduction. - General Commentary. - The Texts [Arsinoïte nome, 238-226 B.C.]. - Indexes.

C.R. par Lucia Criscuolo, Aegyptus 73 (1993) pp. 284-285. - Arnold Kränzlein, Gnomon 67 (1995) pp. 233-236. - Gabriella Messeri Savorelli, BibO 51 (1994) coll. 337-341. - John F. Oates, BASP 29 (1992) pp. 191-198. - Orsolina Montevecchi, Aegyptus 75 (1995) pp. 323-325. - J. David Thomas, JEA 82 (1996) pp. 235-236.
